mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 No, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, DATE_ADD(BOARD_INSERTDATE, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) AS BOARD_INSERTDATE, BOARD_WRITER FROM BOARD_LIST, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r WHERE BOARD_NO > 0 ORDER BY No DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_LIST( BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES ( #{board_writer}, #{board_title}, #{board_content} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
